question: Question_01_(j)
statement:
A racing car travels along the ellipse

\begin{align*}\displaystyle{}x^2+2y^2=9\end{align*}

where x and y are measured in kilometers. When the car is at the point
(1,2), the x-coordinate of the point is changing at the rate of 3
kilometers per minute. How fast is the y-coordinate changing at that
moment?
